Chief Summoner Kinsley: Well..., shall we look at your records? You graduated from Einhovant's School of Magic, attained a Wizard''s license at Gludio Temple, passed the Test of the Summoner with flying colors and even received a Recommendation letter from Galatea! Your record is flawless! You shouldn't have any problem! I'm going to recommend you to be a candidate for Arcana Lord, the ultimate summoner! How about it? Will you take the test?
